Name: Madshot
About the game: Cthulhu heard the call In search of eternal life you invited forces beyond your understanding. You must invade that abominable eldritch mountain of slushy nastiness known as Chthulhu. Be it your atonement or damnation. Features: All roads lead to madness • The world of madshot is procedurally generated combined with handcrafted levels • Survey the map and choose your path best suited for your build • Explore and uncover secrets, to gain the insight and power needed for survival in this lovecraftian wasteland Vanquish the eldritch horrors • Choose between a multitude of weapons and masks to switch up your playstyle • Customize your run through countless upgrade combinations • Fight your way through legions of ever more horrifying creatures. • Survive epic and dreadful multi-phased boss battles • Grab objects in your surroundings and use them to get the upper hand in tricky situations Break the cycle of eternal life • The world will change as you progress, each replay offers new surprises • Challenges will reward experimentation and increasingly creative play styles, and unlock unique upgrades and weapons
Meta Title: Madshot: Jun 9, 2022, Overflow and Full Overview
